column4: I'm using Pidgin right now and I do IM and IRC in the same window, different tabs.
Ok. I will consider installing  separate program for irc. Just weird that in 2011 you still need to do it, with all clouds, web and all that shit ;)
Anoter meta question about irc: Is there anyway to disable the "XXX has joined", or "Reaad error" or other "==" messages...
I also read yesterday somebody suggesting something like "/ignore join part leave" (though I may be a little off on the command)
